channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s getting ‘uncomfortably difficult’ to find a job. Here are the bright spots in this labor market.
item.description: Why the latest report is giving job hunters the jitters: longer stretches of unemployment and more part-time work.

item.title: ‘Don’t get your operation on a Thursday,’ this hospital expert warned. Here’s his plan to lower costs and save lives.
item.description: Eugene Litvak has a proven way to improve U.S. hospitals. If only they’d let him.

item.title: This solid market indicator says to buy stocks now and enjoy double-digit gains
item.description: Gold/platinum ratio has an impressive record. It’s turned bullish on U.S. equities.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: The U.S. dollar is still the world’s currency — but maybe not for much longer
item.description: Concerns are rising about the sustainability of U.S. government debt and spending.

item.title: Is the chip sector having a meltdown? By this measure, it’s mostly just Nvidia.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
